description: This Java class represents a request object for moving a token in a board game, including fields for color, token index, and optional dice value, with validation annotations.

classes.name: MoveRequest
classes.description: A data transfer object (DTO) encapsulating the move request details such as color, token index, and optional dice value.

methods.name: getColor
methods.description: Returns the color of the token to move.

methods.name: setColor
methods.description: Sets the color of the token to move.

methods.name: getTokenIndex
methods.description: Returns the index of the token to move.

methods.name: setTokenIndex
methods.description: Sets the index of the token to move.
